name: Senior QA Engineer
description:
Finstek is seeking for a talented and highly skilled QA Engineer to join our Finstek Member Area team. Member's Area (MA) is a specialized software solution for Forex Brokers to gain Traders and Introducing Brokers, and manage their financial transactions (deposits, withdrawals, transfers) to the integrated trading platforms.

Membership Area is a web-based application (Desktop/Mobile) which consists of user and admin areas. It is integrated with numerous 3rd party services, including: eKYC Provider, Payment System Providers (40+ PSP), Trading Platform, CRM and other components of Finstek ecosystem.

Responsibilities

  • Developing test scenarios and cases, writing and executing all kinds of manual tests for testing new features (black box and white box testing)
  • Manual behavioral testing (mobile and web UIs mostly)
  • Working as a part of scrum team in parallel with developers to continuously produce shippable product increments
  • Helping PO/PM with defining acceptance criteria, ensuring edge cases are identified and covered, eliminating dependencies between user stories

You Will Need to have

  • 3+ years of experience in a QA position
  • 3+ year hands-on experience of testing web applications, experience in FinTech or enterprise solutions is a plus
  • Knowledge of Agile methodologies and such frameworks as Kanban and Scrum
  • Familiar with Jira, Confluence
  • Basic knowledge of SQL
  • Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing
  • Good communication and negotiating skills
  • Ability to work autonomously and take responsibility
  • Upper-intermediate written and spoken English (B1+)

We Would Love to See

  • Understanding forex trading domain
  • Adopting Agile and goal-oriented approach
  • Experience in API testing
  • Automation testing is a plus
  • Willingness to learn, grow in the company

These are Just Some of Our Benefits

  • Professional trainings and conferences, with the partial/full compensation
  • Free English lessons (Skyeng)
  • Medical insurance (depends on location)
  • Corporate events
  • Possibility to work remotely

About Us

Finstek is a leading technology provider focusing on providing cutting-edge fintech solutions for institutions operating in financial markets. The development of high-tech reliable software and services for covering our customers' needs is in our DNA. Our customers are worldwide FX Market Brokers.
